title: (x) Sprint logo font? / humanist sans - TheSans {Tim A}
content: does anyone know the font used in the Sprint logo? thanks! [http://randomtoreason.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/sprint-logo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092538/http:/randomtoreason.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/sprint-logo1.jpg "http://randomtoreason.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/sprint-logo1.jpg")
author: elizabeth_r_johnson

comments.content:
Hi Elizabeth, that's Lucas de Groot's Thesans:  
 [http://www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092538/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesans/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesans/")
I’ll move this thread to the appropriate place, the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092538/http:/typophile.com/typeid).

Theunis’ picture is [Pill Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092538/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/betatype/pill-gothic/). I’m not sure what it does here, though.

Edit: Nevermind. He was only directing you towards the right forum. That ad doesn’t display everytime you load Typophile.
